description: A new study shows requirements for social media skills are up from just last year.
title: Help wanted: Instagram skills required
teaser: A new study shows requirements for social media skills are up from just last year.
itags: Marketplace for 7/29/13 - Mad men to math men
contentencoded:
This final note today, based on a story in the Wall Street Journal. A study by a job search site called Indeed.com found requirements for social media skills are way up, even from last year.

Jobs saying Instagram skills were desirable -- up 644 percent. Twitter abilities -- up 44 percent.

Courtesy of the Wall Street Journal

Thing is, how hard is that
